ch0155_00_dracaena/0101_0701_02_10:
There are so many sync pairs on Pasio. Let’s play
with all of them!
ch0155_00_dracaena/0601_0701_01_10:
In Kalos, when someone does you a kindness, it’s
customary to give them a tip in return.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0601_0701_02_10:
Pasio doesn’t seem to have that custom, so what
do you think I should do to show my appreciation?
What would people here want to receive?
ch0155_00_dracaena/0602_0701_01_10:
I believe the trick to growing stronger is
enjoying battles.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0602_0701_02_10:
Even if you lose, as long as you enjoyed the battle
with your Pokémon, you’ll be ready to give
it your all next time.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0602_0701_03_10:
If you aren’t having fun, you won’t be in the right
state of mind and you could wind up losing your
next battle.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0602_0701_04_10: That’s why I often call battles “play.”
ch0155_00_dracaena/0603_0701_01_10:
In Sinnoh, there are many myths about the storied
history between people and Pokémon.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0603_0701_02_10:
Pasio is new and artificially created, but someday
it may also have such stories.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0603_0701_03_10:
A place where history is waiting to be written...
When you think about it like that, it
sounds marvelous.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0604_0701_01_10:
As a member of the Kalos Elite Four, I was always
waiting for someone to come play with me.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0604_0701_02_10:
Of course I enjoyed playing with challengers, and I
took pride in what I did.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0604_0701_03_10:
But on Pasio, I can go where I want and play with
all manner of sync pairs. It is lovely.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0604_0701_04_10:
It reminds me of a time before I joined the Kalos
Elite Four. Adventures are so fun and delightful, no
matter what age you are.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0605_0701_01_10:
The accessories I wear are a traditional design
within my family.
ch0155_00_dracaena/0605_0701_02_10:
They’re made from the fangs of dragons. Aren’t
they charming?
ch0155_00_dracaena/0605_0701_03_10:
I’m certain they’d look great on you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0155_00_dracaena/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, dear! So this is where you’ve been. I have
something I want to give you.
ch0155_00_dracaena/1701_0701_02_10:
When I came upon this, you immediately jumped
to mind. I think it will suit you.
ch0155_00_dracaena/1701_0702_02_10:
You and your partner Pokémon are
simply charming!
ch0155_00_dracaena/2501_0701_01_10:
My partner Pokémon is growing stronger and
stronger—I think it’s because we’ve been spending
time with you. It brings me joy!
ch0155_00_dracaena/2501_0701_02_10:
You and your Pokémon are so strong. Playing with
you is an inspiration. I’m truly grateful.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2501_0702_01_10:
Seeing you and your partner Pokémon grow
warms my heart as much as seeing my own
partner grow.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2501_0702_02_10:
Somewhere inside you is the potential to become
the greatest sync pair one day...
ch0155_00_dracaena/2501_0702_03_10:
I look forward to seeing how you and your
Pokémon grow.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2511_0701_01_10: How do you think time and space came to be?
ch0155_00_dracaena/2511_0701_02_10:
There’s a story that’s passed down in my
grandparents’ hometown.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2511_0701_03_10:
The story says that a Pokémon governs time and
another Pokémon governs space.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2511_0701_04_10: It’s a bit of a curious story, but it’s one I believe.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2511_0702_01_10:
If there weren’t Pokémon maintaining time and
space, this world may never have come to be.
ch0155_00_dracaena/2511_0702_02_10:
We may just owe our meeting—and even our
own existences—to those Pokémon.
ch0155_00_dracaena/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh dear me, you still look quite sleepy. I know...
Playing with my Pokémon will wake you right up!
ch0155_00_dracaena/3003_0701_01_10:
Let’s have lots of fun training today! I’m sure our
Pokémon will get stronger!
ch0155_00_dracaena/3005_0701_01_10:
You were so energetic today, you must be tired!
I’m sure you’ll sleep like a baby tonight.
